nodes.title: Fix #113. Add more features to the bootstrap props

Update parent to 2.0.1-S and set compatibility reference to 2.0.0

Remove JDBC metrics for now as we cannot make it optional

baseRel and baseParam are no more required
Add scanning and registering of configuration lookups, java 8 WS fixes

JMS JEE mode, polling and refactoring

Use HTTPS URL for Sonatype repository

add detailed stacktrace in case of Seedstack dump failure

Change Jersey Filter Priority to lower value

Warn when no base package is specified, fixes #208

Config by kernel params and system props

Add validation to core, validating config

Drop usage of ServletModule for container registration

Better logs and exception traces, fixes #188
